text: unkalukku munnirunta cantatikalil (tankalum nallolukkattaik kataipitittu marra manitarkalum) pumiyil visamam ceyyatu tatuttu varakkutiya arivalikal (atikamaka) iruntirukka ventama? Avarkal oru corpa ennikkaiyiltan iruntanar. Nam avarkalai patukattuk kontom. Anal, (perumpalana) aniyayakkararkalo tankal acapacankalaip pinparrik kurram ceypavarkalakave iruntanar
